description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; figure dressed in black in center running with arms extended above his head; his face is featureless except for eyes; background in black except for areas of white with jagged borders
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the First Scene, Plate 1 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
